effect.sun_moon: For five turns, heals all Pokémon on the ground for 1/16 their max HP each turn and strengthens their grass moves to 1.5× their power. Changes nature power to energy ball.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: For five turns, heals all Pokémon on the ground for 1/16 their max HP each turn and strengthens their grass moves to 1.5× their power. Changes nature power to energy ball.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: For five turns, heals all Pokémon on the ground for 1/16 their max HP each turn and strengthens their grass moves to 1.5× their power. Changes nature power to energy ball.

short_effect.sun_moon: For five turns, heals all Pokémon on the ground for 1/16 max HP each turn and strengthens their grass moves to 1.5× their power.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: For five turns, heals all Pokémon on the ground for 1/16 max HP each turn and strengthens their grass moves to 1.5× their power.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: For five turns, heals all Pokémon on the ground for 1/16 max HP each turn and strengthens their grass moves to 1.5× their power.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user turns the ground to grass for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn and powers up Grass type-moves.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user turns the ground to grass for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn and powers up Grass type-moves.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user turns the ground to grass for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn and powers up Grass-type moves.
